Blog.post: i like this photo of this lighting. i wonder if there would be rainbows on the walls? now that is real lighting if there was!

okay i'm on a light phase so hope you can hang around! this looks really coool i would hate to change all the light bulbs. i do think that is a nice place for it in a coffee house. i'm really looking for crazy lighting and nothing that i have posted has even came close. i guess i'll keep looking!

okay there asking 85 bucks for these really neat lights! www.welldressedhome.com i beleive is the link! now i believe they are just round balls of light you can put anywhere... i would love to have that it would be great to take camping or get in the mood! shur why not!

After 5 years working i finally get noticed now i'm full time! however it is not on-air but i get to multi task... i guess you have to be rude and have an additude to get anywhere in this messed up world... i guess kind hearted people never get anywere... what is wrong with this world? anyone!

www.wondir.org great website it is a message board for the most part but you ask or answer questions anyone may have! it really is fun! well i'm off to explore this blog stuff i know i understand it i just don't at the same time! ummm a question maybe i'll check that web site!
urlLink i would love to go on this show i just have so much i want to do i have to narrow it down some... i'm going to think about this one for a week or so and post my shortened plan up!
urlLink Marks web page he uses flash so i can copy the photo here... well i can but i don't think it is work all that work just go see it. nice work Mark.

thanks to a comment on my blog by urlLink lynus i have found another great site... the price is a little high... but my goals are as well! some of the stuff on this page is really really neat.. i'm at work right now so i will do my best to get all my interest up. urlLink "The ProScope is a handheld USB microscope that allows you to display and capture microscopic images with your computer." i really would like to know how this works... A pen that remembers what you right! i bet the government is having a ball with this idea! think about it if a pen can copy what you write the have a portable device to up load it to you pc.. were you don't need the usb cord... but i'm no government i guess i'll have to do it with the cord... i really don't want to own this i just want to try it! very need idea for people with no brain cells left!

well good day to you.. i'm on my lunch brake eating my favorite food item from taco bell those cheesy patatos.. yummy oh and drinking my red bull... boy last night at work was fun! i get in there and mike is there all ready half crocked... you know i like mike i just wish he didn't drink! the same goes for will. i wish they didn't drink! it's okay to drink even 1 time a week.. but all the freakn time! all that shows me is they have no passion for life! no goals just drinking goals and that it controls them... i guess i have my ex to thank for that... but he was just a drunk! but anyway we didn't get that busy last night but there were a table full of chicks that danced and my boss was there so that made me look soo good.... i even got to give a shot special.... so i get home and go to bed... i'm guessing 4 hours is enough sleep cuz i'm not really that tired. i will be tho.. i still might go home and sleep for a while! i guess i never get enough sleep concidering i like to sleep 8-10 hours a nite! well i'm going to finish eating instead of bloggeling! good day!!!

well i started my new job with in my old company that i have worked for! laid back job i do believe i just have a lot to get to geather. I made this blog and no one ever comments on it! maybe i should promote it or something i really don't know. i guess i don't even care. but i think someone should comment on my blog damn it! i would feel better if someone would... i mean i want to start an art contest and give a way money

i want to host a contest an art contest... so if you or anyone knows of anyone who would be interested in an art contest.. comment on this post... there will be a cash prize i just don't know how much yet... i will have more details coming up! in a week or two!

okay i have seen the commercials where everyone has bogo on the brain... well i never understood how awsome that sale is... it ended today... and yesterday i went shoe shopping! i got 4 shoes for 30 bucks... see i love shoes like most women do. but i mainly have black shoes so i needed some color in my shoes i got blue and white ones that are the same just differnt colors.. i got a pair of tan strapes sandles and a pair of black ones! got to have black shoes... now i need to find winter shoess... i'll do that soon! i hope!

i have allways told this story it is true. even tho it is hard to belive. in 1997 there was a doulbe sun... around 3-4 pm i seen 7 rainbows. they were in complete circles. and they never touched any other rainbow. but yeah 7 of them... i drew a photo cuz i didn't have a camrea. my mom and my boss also seen these rainbows. i will make a post of my drawling soon as i get it to this pc. but soon i will be able to get internet at my home again! i was sober as well.

urlLink this is a great idea. it is not forever on your car like a bumper sticker! just hope you have metal bumplers or have a backing for plastic cars. i think if you can make them coustom it would be better. i guess i like the little dragonflys but i would rather make somehting cooler like flames or dice or something that is not an animal. i will have to look into magnetic tattoos some more find differnt styles and ideas...
Nice chair all bamboo. i would feel like a queen if i had a room done in this stuff! here is the link to the store i found.. urlLink click here

boy i am going to be so tired by tuesday i get to work a double every day till then... i'm still very excited to start my new job. that feeling is a great feeling. i will miss my friends i will only be able to see one or two a week unless they come see me at work! the bar would be the only one they could do come up to see me at! i love my jobs so far! i get to stuff envalopes. not that fun but i get paid. not that i mind stuffing envalopes.. well that is my thoughts for today! or at least for now!
